title: Simon (new cat) missing from Cats endpoint

comments.author: Mel.3064
comments.body:
The new holographic car and the two WvW cats also need whitelisting.

Do the new services sold by Holomancer Netto (https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/Holomancer_Netto) count as home nodes?

comments.author: bostrees.5306
comments.body:
Cool cool, I’ll keep checking over the next few days

Once again, I’m pleasantly surprised with how quickly and courteously you handle the volume of requests that come in through this forum (never mind what your other work load must be), so thanks very much for all the work you do for us devs out there

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: I might have this by the end of the week? Added it in yesterday, need to integrate the change out to live and deploy.

comments.author: bostrees.5306
comments.body: Probably just an oversight in whitelisting, I’d imagine, since searching all cat IDs doesn’t show any new entries for the “missing” numbers in the cat list (0, 30, 31, and 34)
